title: Profound Thoughts: A collection of heart touching poems
description: PROFOUND THOUGHTS explores heart touching feelings which reflects the flavors of life, the madness of love, the value of time, racial discrimination, female infanticide, finding beauty in the most mundane things, different emotions, nature and femininity. Featuring 70 soul stirring poems that condemn abuse of nature, traverse different facets of our emotions, and touching on femininity and fitness
author: Kavitha Yarlagadda
